> 
> > I use 1.3.0 on Windows XP to do a broadscape crawl, and use
> > MirrorWriter to store the downloaded resource. after a period of 
time,

> > directory, and there's still 1.5G free disk space. I guess it 
reaches
> > some limitation.
>

> St.Ack

can not make manually.
